target.mrk: Configurer la protection sur l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

trans-unit.source: In addition to the protection policies defined on the server, users can view protection activity and configure protection policies locally on their own machines through the Settings pane.

seg-source.mrk: In addition to the protection policies defined on the server, users can view protection activity and configure protection policies locally on their own machines through the Settings pane.

target.mrk: En plus des stratégies de protection définies sur le serveur , les utilisateurs peuvent afficher l'activité de protection et configurer les stratégies de protection localement sur leurs propres machines via le volet Paramètres.

trans-unit.source: Users must have the necessary rights and their customized protection policies cannot conflict with the protection rules on the server. The server rules take precedence. <MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2023-02-23T18:24:13.9973392+01:00" MadCap:creator="lisal" MadCap:initials="LI" MadCap:comment="Propo, confirmation demandée à Silvain C le 24/02/23 : The Lina server validates if the agent configuration is compatible or not with the server rules " MadCap:editor="lisal" MadCap:editDate="2023-02-24T15:27:17.9031270+01:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">A validation is performed to indicate when the agent configuration is incompatible with the rules </MadCap:annotation>defined on the server.

seg-source.mrk: Users must have the necessary rights and their customized protection policies cannot conflict with the protection rules on the server.

<MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2023-02-23T18:24:13.9973392+01:00" MadCap:creator="lisal" MadCap:initials="LI" MadCap:comment="Propo, confirmation demandée à Silvain C le 24/02/23 : The Lina server validates if the agent configuration is compatible or not with the server rules " MadCap:editor="lisal" MadCap:editDate="2023-02-24T15:27:17.9031270+01:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">A validation is performed to indicate when the agent configuration is incompatible with the rules </MadCap:annotation>defined on the server.

target.mrk: Les utilisateurs doivent disposer des droits nécessaires et leurs politiques de protection personnalisées ne peuvent pas entrer en conflit avec les règles de protection du serveur.

<MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2023-02-23T18:24:13.9973392+01:00" MadCap:creator="lisal" MadCap:initials="LI" MadCap:comment="Propo, confirmation demandée à Silvain C le 24/02/23 : The Lina server validates if the agent configuration is compatible or not with the server rules " MadCap:editor="lisal" MadCap:editDate="2023-02-24T15:27:17.9031270+01:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Une validation est effectuée pour indiquer quand la configuration de l'agent est incompatible avec les règles </MadCap:annotation>définies sur le serveur.

trans-unit.source: If users are given the right to define their own protection policies and subsequently decide to terminate that right, they lose their customized configurations.

seg-source.mrk: If users are given the right to define their own protection policies and subsequently decide to terminate that right, they lose their customized configurations.

target.mrk: Si les utilisateurs ont le droit de définir leurs propres politiques de protection et décident ensuite de mettre fin à ce droit, ils perdent leurs configurations personnalisées.

trans-unit.source: Your administrator has already defined some policies that apply to all the agents in your network. However, if you have the necessary rights, you can customize your own protection policy in the Settings menu.

seg-source.mrk: Your administrator has already defined some policies that apply to all the agents in your network.
However, if you have the necessary rights, you can customize your own protection policy in the Settings menu.

target.mrk: Votre administrateur a déjà défini certaines stratégies qui s'appliquent à tous les agents de votre réseau.
Toutefois, si vous disposez des droits nécessaires, vous pouvez personnaliser votre propre politique de protection dans le menu Paramètres.

trans-unit.source: <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.user" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> The rules defined by your administrator on the server always have priority. A validation is performed to indicate when the agent configuration is incompatible with the rules defined on the server.</MadCap:conditionalText>

seg-source.mrk: <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.user" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> The rules defined by your administrator on the server always have priority.
A validation is performed to indicate when the agent configuration is incompatible with the rules defined on the server.</MadCap:conditionalText>

target.mrk: <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.user" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Les règles définies par votre administrateur sur le serveur ont toujours la priorité.
Une validation est effectuée pour indiquer quand la configuration de l'agent est incompatible avec les règles définies sur le serveur.</MadCap:conditionalText>

trans-unit.source: <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.user" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">If your administrator changes the rights for users, you can lose your customized protection.</MadCap:conditionalText>

seg-source.mrk: <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.user" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">If your administrator changes the rights for users, you can lose your customized protection.</MadCap:conditionalText>

target.mrk: <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.user" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Si votre administrateur modifie les droits des utilisateurs, vous pouvez perdre votre protection personnalisée.</MadCap:conditionalText>
